user.title: Connect to OpenEI
user.description:
Enter your free OpenEI API key to fetch utility rate data.

Get a key at: {signup_url}

select_utility.title: Select Your Utility
select_utility.description: We found these utility companies near your Home Assistant location. Select yours from the list below.

select_rate_plan.title: Select Your Rate Plan
select_rate_plan.description: Choose the rate plan you're currently enrolled in. Check your utility bill if you're unsure.

gas_config.title: Gas Rate (Optional)
gas_config.description: OpenEI doesn't provide gas rates, but you can manually enter your gas rate here. Check your gas bill for the current rate per therm.

error.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key. Please check your key at apps.openei.org.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to OpenEI. Please check your internet connection.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error.invalid_utility: Please select a valid utility company.
error.invalid_rate_plan: Please select a valid rate plan.

abort.api_error: Failed to communicate with OpenEI API. Please try again later.
abort.no_utilities: No utilities found. Please verify your API key.
abort.no_rate_plans: No residential rate plans found for this utility.

init.title: Update Communal Grid Settings
init.description: Update your gas rate configuration. Electric rates are fetched automatically from OpenEI.
